channel.title: I have a short question

item.title: I have a short question
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Of_GdogScape Owner_Of_GdogScape
item.description:
@Owner_Of_GdogScape wrote:

Does this have anything to do with…Okay let me explain, when a person tries to log on with one IP twice and they log in almost at the same time could I change anything in this to make it to where after about 3 logins a few moments apart it bans the host.
And what would I have to change if this does have anything to do with what is said above.

[code] public void banHost(String host, int num) {
if (false) {
banned.add(host);
} else {
try {
misc.println(“BANNING HOST " + host + " (flooding)”);
banned.add(host);
delay = 2000;
delayUpdate = System.currentTimeMillis() + 60000;
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}

}[/code]

If you could help me that would be great!

Read full topic
